short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple and easy-to-use Random Letter Picker extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WTM Random Letter Picker is an extension designed to assist users in quickly generating random letters from the alphabet. Whether you need a random note for educational purposes, brainstorming sessions, or any other creative endeavor, this extension provides a convenient solution within your web browser.
